Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Robin Lockwood is a teenager living in one of the richest areas of Nomad, formally Nottingham. When his Father, Walter, is murdered by the Nova Party, Robin will do everything in his power to avenge his death. Working with an ex military only known as 'The Fryer', Rob takes on a new identity as 'The Hood'. Working as an outlaw throughout the city, Rob works towards exposing Nova Britannia, whilst also stopping a devious plot to rid the city of the slums and it's occupants for good.
imdb.title: Hood
plot: A modern day Robin _Hood_ (qv) reboot, set in Nottingham.

Robin Lockwood is a teenager living in one of the richest areas of Nomad, formally Nottingham. When his Father, Walter, is murdered by the Nova Party, Robin will do everything in his power to avenge his death. Working with an ex military only known as 'The Fryer', Rob takes on a new identity as 'The _Hood_ (qv)'. Working as an outlaw throughout the city, Rob works towards exposing Nova Britannia, whilst also stopping a devious plot to rid the city of the slums and it's occupants for good.
